Title: The Eternal Champion.

Authors: Michael Moorcock;Tom Canty.

Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=Fo8RPwAACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Young and old, familiar fans and newcomers, will be captivated by Michael Moorcock's legendary Eternal Champion collection. Timeless, classic and beyond a doubt one of the foundations of modern Fantasy, the Eternal Champion is a series of stories that no Fantasy aficionado should pass up. Includes The Eternal Champion, Phoenix in Obsidian, To Rescue Tanelorn and The Sundered Worlds..
Published Year: 1996.
